r.s: Create and Use PHP Archive files
r.d: PHP_Archive allows you to create a single .phar file containing an entire application.
r.n:
Update to match phar extension
Final API for 1.0.0 is set
Add support for:
* Phar metadata - any serialized value * file-specific metadata - any serialized value * bzip2 compression of files * SHA1/MD5 signature creation (Phar extension can use this, PHP_Archive does not on open for performance reasons) * file permissions (always set to 0555)
